Uploader.dragFiles: Drag 'n' drop files here or click to select files
Uploader.metadataError: An error occurred during metadata extraction!
Uploader.flawError: An error occurred during faulty image detection!

InfoModal.emptyCheckText: Classifies a document page as blank if the page has no content, or having content if the page is not blank. Content reflected through the back of the page or content elements such as page numbers and pencil markings may lead to incorrect classification.
InfoModal.postItText: Classifies the document page into two classes based on whether or not the page contains one or more post-it notes. Content elements that resemble post-it notes, such as coloured rectangular text fields, may result in incorrect classification.
InfoModal.bentCornerText: Classifies the document page into two categories based on whether or not the page contains folded or torn sections. If a document corner resembles a fold or tear due to its colour or shape, this may lead to an incorrect classification.
InfoModal.metadataText: Identifies name identities from the result of the optical character recognition performed on the document page, produces descriptive keywords for the text and determines the language used in the text content. Based on the identified language, either Finnish or English models are used in identifying and keywording metadata. The Annif software developed at the National Library of Finland (www.annif.org) is used in automated keywording. Identification results depend on the quality of OCR, so image file inaccuracy, text layout, and table-like content elements, for example, may affect the quality of metadata identification.
InfoModal.keyWordsText: Käyttää Annif-ohjelmistoa automaattiseen asiasanoittamiseen. Ohjelmisto perustuu erilaisten koneoppimismallien yhdistämiseen. Annif on kehitetty Kansalliskirjastossa, ks. www.annif.org
InfoModal.writingTypeText: Classifies the document page into one of the following three classes on the basis its typefaces: 1) “typed” if the page only contains typed text, 2) “handwritten” if the page only contains handwritten text, and 3) “combined” if the page contains both typefaces. Combination class identification is the most difficult of these for artificial intelligence, especially if there is little handwritten text.

PdfDisplay.error: There was an error in loading the document!
